EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Airline Operators Webinar Series: Avionics Track
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Airline Operators Webinar Series - Avionics - Roadmap and Updates
To join the event, please log on to the webinar platform by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2296408/10276500298888474C6A9AB0AC9973F1]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: April 30, 2020 Time: 1:00 p.m. GMT, 8:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
